items.sentence: There were a lot of things Tom needed to buy.
Tom already knows that Mary needs to do that.
She greeted him cheerfully as she always did.
When you\'re in trouble, you can count on me.
Who\'s the person Tom went to Boston to help?
If you don\'t want to go, you don\'t have to.
If you don\'t want to go, you don\'t need to.
How did you know that Tom was born in Boston?
How did you talk Tom into doing that for you?
How long did it take you to write the letter?
Tom says he\'s too tired to do anything else.
Tom should\'ve told Mary that he was married.
Tom took a screwdriver out of the tool chest.
Tom took off his glasses and closed his eyes.
Tom translated everything into French for me.
Tom tried to leave, but Mary blocked his way.
Tom tried to remember what Mary had told him.
I can\'t believe Tom named his kid after you.
I can\'t blame you for breaking your promise.
I didn\'t charge Tom anything for doing that.
Why don\'t we go inside the store to warm up?
Without your help, we couldn\'t have done it.
There were a lot of people at Tom\'s funeral.
Tomorrow, I\'ll return the money you lent me.
Tomorrow, I\'m going to study at the library.
I have a sewing machine, but I rarely use it.
I have some friends in the police department.
I have some unfinished business to attend to.
I have something I have to do in the evening.
I put the meat we just bought in the freezer.
Do you think you would ever consider suicide?
Tom doesn\'t make as much money as Mary does.
Tom doesn\'t need to come so early next time.
Tom doesn\'t need to finish this by tomorrow.
Tom doesn\'t need to know who told Mary that.
Tom doesn\'t need to tell me. I already know.
I have a feeling that I\'ve been here before.
I have to work hard to make up for lost time.
I have two cats, a black one and a white one.
Tom said he would do his homework by himself.
Tom said he would never come back here again.
Could you describe to the jury what happened?
Could you please be quieter? Tom is sleeping.
Could you please move over to make some room?
Tom is usually broke by the end of the month.
Tom knew that something had happened to Mary.
Let\'s just forget this whole thing happened.
Let\'s just pretend we have a happy marriage.
You can always count on Tom in any emergency.
My ex-wife wants to ruin my new relationship.
